
```{r}
hmm_data <- bacc_2017_metrics %>%
  select(bird_id, start_time, prop_wet) %>%
  mutate(
  time_bin = as.POSIXct(paste(date, start_time), format = "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"),
  state = ifelse(prop_wet>0.5, 1, 0) #binary state for wet/dry if we want to use it
  )

```
